about_the_game:
Unlock your hidden potential!  Level yourself up with Super Duper Multitasking, the game that tickles your brain in ways you've never imagined!  Using an intuitive control scheme and your amazing gaming skills, you'll soon be playing up to 3, 4, or even 5 minigames at a time!  See just how far you can go, wow your streaming audience, and compete with players around the world!

This unique concept from a one-man indie developer splits the screen into 3, 4, or 5 portions, each controlled by a different part of your gamepad: left stick, right stick, face buttons, bumper buttons, and trigger buttons.  You can use your keyboard as well!  You'll use these "mini-screens" to play minigames as they appear and disappear, shuffling in and out.  You'll start with just one at a time, but before you know it, you'll be unlocking your hidden talents and playing multiple minigames at once!

Super Duper Multitasking expands on 2018's Super Multitasking to offer a huge variety of ways to both test your skills and reveal the abilities you never knew you had!

  • Tutorial: In just 2 minutes, you'll learn the basics!

  • Quickplay: The core game mode.  It starts off easy and gets tougher as you go.  Last as long as possible without making any mistakes!  Fully customizable difficulty and hundreds of Leaderboards!

  • Mission: 100 unique scenarios, ranging from super easy to punishingly tough.  How many can you clear?  If you get stuck, you can adjust the difficulty to make them easier.  Plus, there's built-in speedrunning support with Leaderboards!

  • Versus: 2 players can battle head-to-head.  A wild, unique, unforgettable experience!

  • Gauntlet: Skip the buildup and jump right into the action with five intense 30-second rounds!  If you make a mistake, just keep on going!  Your performance will be evaluated.

  • Minigame Training: The 24 unique minigames will be introduced one at a time.  No multitasking here!

  • Multitasking Training: Difficulty will not increase while playing, and there's no penalty for failure.  Build your skills!

  • Bonus: 10 variants of Quickplay Mode that transform the experience in unexpected ways!  Special minigame flavors and other surprises await, like a break-breaker game, a space shooter, and a dancepad-compatible Workout Mode!

  • Tournament: Up to 24 players get the same Quickplay Mode sequence.  Who will win?

  • Practice: Set up any kind of situation you want and try it out!  Great for building your skills.

This infinitely-replayable workout for your brain is full of options and surprises!  It's great at parties, for warming up before long gaming sessions, or for pushing yourself to your limits!  Your streaming audience will cheer you on and celebrate when you clear tough Missions or set new personal bests!  Experience it with your friends for a night of screams, shouts, and cheers!  It's wild, unpredictable, and a ton of fun...it's Super Duper Multitasking!

 

(If you want to try this game out for FREE, or just want more of it, check out Super Multitasking GO!)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 (Mountain Lion) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo P8600, equivalent, or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: Xbox One*, Xbox 360*, DualShock4, Switch Pro, and Steam Controllers supported. * requires 360Controller driver, downloadable here:

name: Super Duper Multitasking

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, equivalent, or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 600 series, AMD Radeon HD 7000 series, Intel HD/Iris Graphics 6000, equivalent, or better
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Unlock your hidden potential! Level yourself up and tickle your brain with Super Duper Multitasking!  Using an intuitive control scheme and your amazing gaming skills, this expansion of 2018's Super Multitasking will train you to play up to 3, 4, or even 5 minigames at a time!
